name: Dungeon Friends
description:
(It might be running/loading slow playing the first time)

~

𝔗𝔥𝔢 𝔤𝔞𝔪𝔢

Join Pepsi and Fritte on their roleplay adventure as they travel through a dungeon inhabited by some droll folks.

Dungeon Friends is a short visual novel made in 1 week for our Illustration class.

~

ℭ𝔯𝔢𝔡𝔦𝔱𝔰

Art and Story by Froggy and Dea 

~
